title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 150.11 - Agency performance evaluation plans
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 150.11 - Agency performance evaluation plans

State Regulations

The Director of the Budget may require each agency to submit
a plan, developed in accordance with guidelines as may be issued for such
purposes, which at a minimum sets forth the agency's projected rating plan and
anticipated expenditures for advancement payments for the ensuing fiscal
year. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
150.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
